#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

long long sum,n;
void merge_sort(int a[],int,int);

int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    int k;
    while(t--)
    {
      sum=0;
      scanf("%d %d",&n,&k);
      int a[n];
      
      for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
      scanf("%d",&a[i]);
      merge_sort(a,0,n-1);
      
      for(int i=0;i<k;i++)
      sum+=a[--n];
      
      printf("%lld\n",sum);
    }
 return 0;
}




void merge(int a[],int l,int m,int u)
{
int b[n],l1,u1,i;
l1=l; u1=m+1; i=l;

while(l1<=m && u1<=u)
{
if(a[l1]<a[u1])
{b[i++]=a[l1++];}
else
{b[i++]=a[u1++];}
}

while(u1<=u)
{ b[i++]=a[u1++];}
while(l1<=m)
{b[i++]=a[l1++];}

for(i=l;i<=u;i++)
a[i]=b[i];
}

void merge_sort(int a[],int l,int u)
{
int m;
if(l<u)
{ m=(l+u)/2 ;
merge_sort(a,l,m);
merge_sort(a,m+1,u);
merge(a,l,m,u); }
}
